event RelayBridgeTransferStarted(bytes32 indexed transactionId, address indexed user, bytes reciever, address from, bytes to, tuple(uint256 amountIn, bytes32 requestId) relayData, uint256 destinationChainId, bytes destinationCalldata)

function bridgeViaRelay(bytes32 _transactionId, address _user, uint256 _maxAmountIn, address _from, uint256 _destinationChainId, bytes _receiver, bytes _to, bytes _destinationCalldata, tuple(uint256 amountIn, bytes32 requestId) _relayData) payable
function getRelayAddress() view returns (address receiver, address solver)
